articles.author: Stephanie Van Den Berg
articles.title: Human Rights Watch says Israel's deprivation of water in Gaza is act of genocide - Reuters
articles.description: Human Rights Watch said on Thursday that Israel has killed thousands of Palestinians in Gaza by denying them clean water which it says legally amounts to acts of genocide and extermination.

articles.author: Lewis Krauskopf, Suzanne McGee
articles.title: US stocks face headwind from rising yields after Fed signals fewer rate cuts - Reuters
articles.description: The rally in U.S. stocks is encountering a fresh hurdle -- a potentially problematic rise in Treasury yields as the Federal Reserve signals fewer interest rate cuts for 2025.
